nodes.title: Private Client Wealth Management
nodes.description: At High Rock's Private Client division, we manage money for individuals, families, professional and private corporations on a Separately Managed Account (SMA) basis.

nodes.title: High Yield and Special Mandates
nodes.description: We manage several high yield bond mandates for corporations, family trusts, endowments and some high net worth individuals

strapiIntroService.title: High Rock has two distinct yet very synergistic divisions
